title: Question 5
prompt:
Sentence 8: It is characterized by swelling and blisters.

Which correction should be made to sentence 8?
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback:
The word “it” in this sentence refers to the words “second degree burns” in the previous sentence. The author is talking about the second degree burns. Since “burns” is plural, the singular pronoun “it” doesn’t match the word it refers to. The pronoun and the antecedent (or word it refers to) both should be plural. The pronoun “it” needs to be replaced with the plural pronoun “they,” and the verb needs to be plural to match.


Second degree burns affect deeper layers of skin. They are characterized by swelling and blisters.
